metadata.title: CVE-2019-19617 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
phpMyAdmin before 4.9.2 does not escape certain Git information, related tolibraries/classes/Display/GitRevision.php and libraries/classes/Footer.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19617` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.9.2+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.9.2+dfsg1-1').
